dataList.name: For You Who Love the City
dataList.desc:
If an ally is at less than 30% HP when hit, said ally heals 80% HP and other allies heal 40% HP next turn (once per Encounter)
- Excess healing beyond max HP is applied as Shield
- If an ally healed 50+ HP due to the above effect, gain 3 [AttackUp] and 3 [DefenseDown]

dataList.name: Meat Tenderizer
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #4 Deployed Identity]

If this unit has 2+ Blunt Attack Skills, gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] at Turn Start

dataList.name: Meat Tenderizer+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #4 Deployed Identity]

If this unit has 2+ Blunt Attack Skills, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> [ParryingResultUp] at Turn Start

dataList.name: Meat Tenderizer++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #4, <style="upgradeHighlight">#5</style> Deployed Identities]

If this unit has 2+ Blunt Attack Skills, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp] at Turn Start

dataList.name: Stolen Fixer Magazine
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Gain 1 [HitResultUp]

Combat Start: Gain 1 [HitDamageUp] if Envy A-Reson. is activated

Encounter Start: If there are 4 or more The Middle-faction Identities on the battlefield, apply [RetaliationBook] to a random enemy

dataList.name: Thermal Weapon
dataList.desc:
On Hit with Envy Skill or Counter Skill, inflict +1 [Laceration] Count or +1 [Combustion] Count (3 times per turn)

When [Laceration] Count on an enemy drops below 1 during combat, reduce [Combustion] Count instead if said enemy has 2+ [Combustion] Count (3 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict Bleed Count and Burn Count
